ComicInfo.Summary:
Rapture breaks up with Dragon; a Covenant agent surveilling them reveals the child they buried was a "drone" and their real child is still alive in a phone conversation with an unknown entity. Dragon kills one more leech after it tries taking over his mind. An entire group of Wicked Worms have joined together to form a group creature, "Horde".
Mighty Man discovers that when cut in half, each part of The Wicked Worm grows into a complete creature, and many of them can act together as a "horde".
ComicInfo.Title: Unfinished Business: Part 3 of 3; Mighty Man and the Critter Crime Wave; Freak Force #0; Mighty Man and the Wicked Worm's Circus of Evil!; Basic Training; Cemetary Requiem; Mighty Man Battles the Conqueror Worm!
ComicInfo.Writer: Chris Eliopoulos,Erik Larsen,Gary Carlson,Jeph Loeb,Gary S. Carlson,Erik Larsen,Gary Carlson,Gary S. Carlson,Jeph Loeb,Chris Eliopoulos
